General.Name: Bai Sha Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Bai Sha Technology Co., Ltd. produces printing products in Taiwan and internationally. It offers packaging color boxes, PP transparent boxes, bags, books, business cards, envelopes, letter paper, official document covers, folders, triangular desk calendars, VIP cards, color stickers, modeling stickers, automatic labeling, invitation cards, catalogs, posters, large image output, display stands, and paper fans. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taichung City, Taiwan.
